translated: Ågren, Nils Eric, social welfare officer, Yar^berg, born on June 22, 1903 in Kristianstad to music dealer Jo’han Fredrik Å. and Karin Winström. Married from 1934 to 1946 to Ali Som-marin. Children: Bodil, born on September 3, 1938. Completed Realexamen in Kristianstad in 1919, Önnestad Land Surveying School in 1922-1923. Received a scholarship for social work studies in Denmark in 1937. Employed at Kristianstad First Household Association from 1924 to 1925, in the family business from 1925 to 1928, as a poor relief assistant in Kristianstad from 1928 to 1939, as a child welfare officer and adoption agent in the child welfare system from 1936 to 1939, as a poor relief officer and secretary in the child welfare system in Varberg from 1939. Chairman of the board for Children's Day in Varberg from 1943, of the Hall County Association of Swedish Social Welfare Officials since 1946, and served as vice-chairman from 1939 to 1946. Vice-chairman of the Pension Fund since 1941. Secretary of the Kristianstad Poor Relief Association from 1937 to 1939, and secretary and committee member of the poor relief board in Varberg from 1939. Secretary of the Morgonsol Foundation from 1943 to 1946. Board member of the Hall County Poor Relief Association and Hall County Children's Welfare Association. Board member of the Morgonsol Foundation since 1943. Voluntary captain in 1941. Member of the Northern Skåne County Shooting Association, field sports committee, rifle shooting committee, swimming committee, and Sports Association.
